text: inezīyami yamenuti sewochi (metageli yalebati) «sura ātiweridimi noro’ālini?» yilalu፡፡ yet’enekerechimi sura beteweredechina bewisit’wami megadeli betewesa gīzē inezīyani belibochachewi wisit’i (yenifik’ina) beshīta yalebachewini sewochi kemoti yeẖone mekera berisu layi inide wedek’ebeti sewi āsiteyayeti wedanite sīmeleketu tayachewalehi፡፡ le’inesumi weyolachewi፡፡
